title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Doug Gottlieb, in for Colin Cowherd, raises serious questions about the Dallas Cowboys this season after a disappointing offseason and their historical struggles in the postseason over the past 2 decades. He backs up the 49ers and head coach Kyle Shanahan for their decision to keep QB Jimmy Garoppolo on their roster as back up to Trey Lance. He also believes the Lakers are headed in the wrong direction because they value the wrong "things". Plus, Daniel Jeremiah from the NFL Network joins the show to tell Doug which NFL team will be the biggest surprise this year. 

#douggottliebshow

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
